Where the
/$
$
Locals Go

$
because if you know, you know
/$
$
/$
$
As a neighborhood tavern located on world-famous Duval Street, Old Town Tavern & Beer Garden opened its doors, and beer garden gate, for locals, tourists, and dogs alike in 2018. Our incredible location, menu, and commitment to service quickly made us one of the top local favorite
​
Set in an old building in the heart of the action, grab a spot at the bar or outside in the airy beer garden to enjoy your drink of choice while watching the roosters go by.
Catch the game and chat with our friendly bartenders and patrons during our twice-daily happy hours. And, of course, dive into our always-delicious, always-housemade menu. With lighter fare, vegetarian options, and all the pub favorites, we have something on our menu to please everyone.
/$
$
restaurants in Key West.
/$
$
View Menu
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
"...GORGEOUS OLD BAR AND A GREAT BARTENDER!..."
- Lisa via Google
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
$
Meet The Owners
/$
$
$
/$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
Nick and Ashlee, a husband and wife team, started their restaurant-ownership ventures on Duval Street, a popular tourist destination for restaurants in Key West. Hailing from
Australia
and Oregon respectively, they envisioned a spot in The Keys where locals and tourists alike would pass their time while enjoying delicious food and drinks all hours of the day.
Having worked in restaurants for much of their lives, the duo knew crowd-pleasing food and cold drinks were a must. They also knew there was more to the magic than dishing up food onto a plate and put into play some extras to make their place authentic and successful - late-night hours and a twice-daily happy hour for the service industry folks, always-changing specials to keep it fresh for the local crowd, an outdoor space for visitors to catch the Key West vibe, and friendly and personable staff for all.
​
But don't just take it from us, stop in for some hospitality and fun! (Nick said you should get the Banh Mi and Ashlee knows you'll love the Scotch Eggs - you won't find them anywhere else on the island!)
/$
$
Find Us
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
"...THE SERVICE WAS GREAT & YOU CAN'T BEAT THE LOCATION...."
- Steven via Google
